text: 1.25 Jon 13.17, Lom 8.2, 2 Ko 3.18, Jem 2.12 God takaw teplep yɨbɨl ak chɨnop gek, tap si tap tɨmel gep ak kelɨgɨl koŋɨm amobun. Pen binɨb takaw anɨb ak nɨgtep gɨnɨgun agɨl, nɨgɨlɨg yɨbɨl gel ameb okok, God kɨlop kod yek, tɨtay gɨnɨgabal ak am tep gɨnɨgab. Kɨli tɨmud ak nep pak nɨŋɨd sawl ma gɨl, agup nep tek kɨdek gɨpal.
